entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 7:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. 30 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water early this evening. Wind becoming light early this evening then becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Showers beginning in the morning. Risk of thunderstorms late in the morning and in the afternoon. 30 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
